oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Efficacy of an Intranasal Delivery of an Avian-Derived Antibody Preparation Against Respiratory Pathogens in Prevention of Morbidity and Mortality of Newly Received Feedlot Cattle

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cattle

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: NPCoatÂ® is effective at reducing respiratory disease incidence and resulting death loss when it is a component of an integral health program for receiving feedlot cattle.
